data.title: I didn’t want to return the "Soda Green" trademark. Wu Qingfeng and the guys can only call it "Fish Ding" - entertainment
data.meta_description: Last year In May, it formally filed a civil lawsuit against Lin Weizhe for "returning the trademark" and "confirming that the brokerage relationship does not exist"
data.text:
Some time ago, in the copyright dispute between Wu Qingfeng and former agent Lin Weizhe, although Wu Qingfeng won the first and second trials, the group name " soda green " has not been used temporarily. On April 8th, the Red Star News reporter learned that regarding Wu Qingfeng and the members of the Lin Weizhe Music Club requesting "return the trademark" and "confirm that the brokerage relationship does not exist", the relevant agency ruled today to confirm that the brokerage relationship between the two parties does not exist, but the remaining demands Rejection means that the trademark right has not been transferred and returned, and Wu Qingfeng and the members of the team can only use the name "Fish Ding" for the time being.

"Soda Green" member

Red Star News reporter learned that Lin Weizhe in addition to claiming the copyright of songs such as "Clarer" created by Qingfeng, but also claiming the trademark rights of "Soda Green", forcing Soda Green's The 6 members Qingfeng, Afu, Jiakai, Xiaowei, A Gong, and Xinyi could only renamed the "Fish Ding System" when performing in the past two years, but Wu Qingfeng and the group members did not give up their names. Last year In May, it formally filed a civil lawsuit against Lin Weizhe for "returning the trademark" and "confirming that the brokerage relationship does not exist".

Now the performance can only be called "Fish Ding"

6 members stated that the Soda Green Orchestra was established by them in 2001, and the "Soda Green Soda green" trademark was also handwritten by Qingfeng. Although they had been with Lin Weizhe in 2004 The music agency signed a brokerage contract, and the "Soda green" trademark was registered by Lin Weizhe in 2007, but the brokerage contract between the two parties is actually only until 2014. The follow-up cooperation is only based on the past tacit understanding, and Soda Green announced the suspension of the group in 2017, May 2019 A lawyer’s letter has been issued this month indicating the termination of the brokerage relationship.

The 6 members requested the court to confirm that Soda Green’s brokerage relationship with Lin Weizhe Music Club no longer exists, and Lin Weizhe Music Club should transfer and return the "Soda Green" trademark.Lin Weizhe Music Club stated that Soda Green did not deny that he had signed a brokerage contract with him, and he also knew that the trademark "Soda Green Soda green" was registered. After the trademark protection period of 10 years, he also applied for an extension of approval in 2018. Therefore, Lin Weizhe should Continue to own the "Soda Green" trademark until 2028, and the trademarks of various orchestras in the music industry are also owned by brokerage companies.

In this regard, the relevant agency today ruled that the brokerage relationship between the two parties did not exist, but the trademark rights did not decide to return the six members of "Soda Green". As for the reasons for the judgment, the court has not yet announced.

Red Star News Correspondent Ren Hongwei

Editor Li Xueli

(Download Red Star News, there are prizes for newspaper materials!)
